draw.overall_supervision_plan: I assess the overall initial risk to be medium due to catastrophic severity of unlikely probability.I assess the overall residual risk to be low due to critical severity of unlikely probability.Most Dangerous Risk: Negligent DischargesMitigation: Sniper cadre will conduct a demonstration of proper weapon safety on the range. Soldiers will maintain muzzle awareness at all times, and all Soldiers will wear all PPE for training. Most Likely Risk: Lower extremity injury during movement on uneven terrain under limited visibility.Mitigation: Lane walkers will be CLS qualified. A CASEVAC vehicle will be present at all times.Comprehensive safety and range briefs will be given to every Soldier prior to conduct of every tryout event. Range OIC, RSO, and Safeties will be on look out at all times for unsafe acts. Medical Personnel/CLS will constantly provide check ups on candidates.
